title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' is shrinking. What's been cut?
shortDescription: Gone are GOP-led efforts to curb environmental rules, attempts to restrict federal judges' powers and plans to bulk up immigration enforcement.

title: Trump lands in Europe with Israel-Iran ceasefire intact
shortDescription: With an Israel-Iran ceasefire holding after a shaky start, Trump plans to jet in and out of a NATO summit in The Hague.

title: National parks staffing faces crunch time amid Trump cuts
shortDescription: National parks, which have been under budget and understaffed for years, are facing a severe worker shortage that has been made worse by cuts by the Trump administration.

title: Can polling sites for NYC mayoral election handle the heat?
shortDescription: As the city heats up to over 100 degrees, polling sites are preparing for the worst: a potential blackout.

title: RFK, Cassidy clash over vaccine committee firings
shortDescription: GOP Sen. Bill Cassidy said a vaccine advisory panel should delay its next meeting and raised questions about potential bias of RFK-appointed members.

title: Trump's pick for top US general in Europe says 'Ukraine can win' war
shortDescription: 'I think any time your own homeland is threatened, you fight with a tenacity that's difficult for us to conceive of,' Trump's pick told the Senate.

title: Judge blocks Trump plan to close Harvard to international students
shortDescription: A judge ruled that the Trump administration cannot block international students from attending Harvard University.

title: Trump drops f-bomb in anger when talking about Israel-Iran conflict
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the f-word when talking about Israel and Iran accusing each other of violating the ceasefire of their "12-day war."

title: Trump drops f-bomb in anger over Israel-Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Israel and Iran "don't know what the f*** they're doing," after each country accused the other of violating a ceasefire.

title: Trump drops F bomb as ceasefire risks unraveling
shortDescription: A furious Donald Trump lashed out with the F word as he addressed the rickety ceasefire between Iran and Israel.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump announced a ceasefire. Did Iran break it?
shortDescription: Israel says yes and vows a forceful response. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Live: A Cuomo comeback? In intense heat, NYC votes in mayor primary
shortDescription: New York City Democrats head to the polls on June 24 to vote in citywide elections that will determine their party's nominee for mayor.

title: Trump blocked from barring Harvard's international students
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked the Trump administration from carrying out its latest bid to curtail Harvard's ability to host international students.

title: Trump announces Israel, Iran ceasefire
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says Israel and Iran agreed to a cease-fire after Iran retaliated for U.S. strikes on three nuclear facilities.

title: Cuomo, Mamdani on campaign trail before NYC mayoral primary election
shortDescription: State Assemblymember Zohran Mamdani and Former governor of New York Andrew Cuomo campaign to becomes New York City's next mayor.

title: Trump's Golden Dome missile defense system
shortDescription: Is President Donald Trump's proposed Golden Dome our best option for preventing a missile strike?
